entry.name: event.metaKey
entry.title: event.metaKey
entry.desc: Indicates whether the META key was pressed when the event fired.
entry.longdesc: Returns a boolean value that indicates whether or not the META key was pressed at the time the event fired. This value varies by system, see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/DOM/event.metaKey for more information.

example.desc: Determine whether the META key was pressed when the event fired.
